segments.text: Excuse me , I'm afraid you've parked in the wrong spot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , really ? Isn't this spot C408 ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , it's D408 , my parking space . I have already paid for it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , I must have been confused . I had thought it's C section , but actually it's D section . I'll move my car right away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's no big deal . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1
